overview:
I am the CTO of Cabot Technology Solutions Pvt. Ltd., a web and mobile application development. These are some of the technologies we work with:

  1. iPhone, iPad, Objective C, Xcode
  2. Android, Java, JavaEE
  3. PhoneGap, JQTouch, Sencha
  4. Adobe AIR, Flex, ActionScript, LCCS, Red5
  5. Enterprise LAMP, Open Source CMS (Wordpress, Joomla, Drupal)
  6. .NET C# Development
  7. Webservices, SOAP, REST, Amazon, etc.
  8. Cloud Infrastructure, Linux admin etc.

Besides technical expertise, our company posses excellent communication and project management skills.

degrees.subject: Computer Science
degrees.institution: T K M College Of Engineering
